p: Reducing arginine availability either by nutrient deprivation or by specific pathogens significantly blunts the immune response, the former via impaired TLR4/MAPK pathway signalling, the latter by inducing arginase 1 via other TLRs in macrophages in an autocrine-paracrine manner involving cytokines, an immune evasion mechanism shown with mycobacteria ( 122) and probably also in SARS-CoV2 infection.
